summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3659 , for the improvement of 31st Avenue North, from East Denny Way to East Thomas Street, under Ordinance No. 45086, by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 45086, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
